menu_l_global_value_eca: This is an Extra Crossbow Ammo addition!
bm_wp_wpn_fps_bow_crossbow_m_rocket_desc: Wolf thought it might've been a good idea to duct tape fireworks to a crossbow bolt to make it fly faster. As long as the rocket doesn't blow up, it'll probably work fine, right?
bm_wp_wpn_fps_bow_crossbow_m_fire_desc:
Hey, they had fire arrows in the medieval ages. Why not fire bolts, too?

Just make sure you don't set yourself on fire with it, too.
